name: Planet Smasher (itch) (jonasmg)
description:
This is idle game is like no other! Somewhat at least... Click your way through.. PLANETS!

Do watch out, early and mid game is very slow....

Jamdna 11 criteria:

Shockwave: the play must create shockwaves to destroy the planets. You then acquire upgrades to different items to make the shockwave bigger. Sometimes astroids and other objects flying in space can be clicked, they will then aim at the planet, hit it and create yet another shockwave. They are everywhere and basically the only game mechanic...

Credits:

JonasMG (Game and Sound design)

Laurits S. (Art)
